statement.p: In 43.48 of the last 23 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{23}}={0.4348}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{23}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4348}\cdot{23}={10.0004}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 23-10.0004=12.9996 We round that as requested to 13.
